name: GKQuad
desc: The definition of an axis-aligned rectangle addressed by the tree.

items.name: var quadMax: vector_float2
items.desc: The corner of the rectangle with the highest coordinate values (in most coordinate systems, the upper-right corner).

items.name: var quadMin: vector_float2
items.desc: The corner of the rectangle with the lowest coordinate values (in most coordinate systems, the lower-left corner).
